mapper.sql: ID, REPLY, REPLY_DES, SEND_ID, RECEIVE_ID, BATCH_NO, SERIAL_NO, APP_ID, SUB_APP, APP_SERIAL_NO, ACK, GMT_CREATED
mapper.select:
select
from UMS_OUT_REPLY where REPLY_DES = #{replyDes} order by GMT_CREATED desc limit 1
